name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jerry HENTOSH, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jerry HENTOSH, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
PER CURIAM:
PETITION GRANTED. ORDER OF THE SUPERIOR COURT ENTERED FEBRUARY 15, 1985 IS REVERSED, AND THIS MATTER IS REMANDED TO THE COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF MERCER COUNTY FOR A HEARING ON TRIAL COUNSEL’S INEFFECTIVENESS AS SET FORTH IN THE PETITION FOR ALLOWANCE OF APPEAL.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
501 A.2d 247
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jerry HENTOSH, Petitioner.
No. 217 W.D. Allocatur Docket, 1985.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.
Dec. 3, 1985.
